item.title: Colombian president urges illegal immigrants in US to return home days after diplomatic spat
item.description: The president of Colombia is urging his nationals in the U.S. illegally to return to Colombia, days after a diplomatic spat with the U.S.

item.title: DOGE announces more than $1B in savings after canceling 104 federal DEI contracts
item.description: Two dozen federal agencies reported a collective $1 billion in savings from the elimination of DEIA/DEI offices and roles within their bureaucracies.
